title: On the Development and Application of Sliding Mode Observers
abstract: This chapter will provide a perspective on the development of sliding mode observers for continuous time systems — primarily those which can be well represented as linear systems subject to bounded nonlinearities/uncertainties. This encompasses a wide range of real engineering systems.
